data.name: Pixel Art Coloring Book - Full Version
data.detailed_description:
Pixel Art Coloring Book - Full Version grants you epic coloring activities for all ages. Have fun coloring by number over 3000 beautiful images in 15+ different categories! Pick your favorite ones and dive into pixel art magic right away!

data.short_description: Pixel Art Coloring Book leads you even further into coloring adventure with the Full Version! Color by number with no limits and tons of choice! Paint over 3000 watermark-free images and create your own masterpieces in no time. Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
